alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 06 at 3:24AM PST until November 09 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM MONDAY TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 feet. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph on Monday. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...From 7 AM Monday to 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Strong winds on Monday may result in blowing snow and reduced visibilities.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
